comment: Very nice, sweet teacher! One of my favorites! you can even call her by her first name. I would recommend taking this professor if you want to have fun, and stay healthy.
All i can say about this teacher is that she acts like a hyped up little ankle biter.

Very nice and sweet prof. Take good notes in class, do all the extra credit (go to KSU gym and workout), do a health portfolio, and you have an A. I guess if your a lazy slob who doesn't care about your health in anyway then you will not do well here.
If you cant pass this class drop out immediately.

If you want to sit around for hours in a boring classroom listening to someone reiterate  words from a power point then throw super difficult tests at you take her. If not run for your life. She is a horrible teacher! Some of the labs were fun, but she just reads from power points and she really wants you to take time and study those power points.
Really nice lady.  Kinda odd, but humorous in a way.  Easy class but hard tests.  I still pulled out an A and i didn't really try.  I wouldn't take it if you're into health.
Ms.Rose was a grea teacher. She was vey helpful in all areas. I WOULD suggest for anyone to take her!!

I learned a lot about health and nutrition during the class labs and lecture. She is very soft spoken, and barely controls her class. She's sweet, but her B personality type tends to leave students  confused about assignments and when they are actually do. You can make up a lot the assignments for a late grade, and most of the people in my class pu

She is a really sweet lady and will help you if you ask. her lectures are boring so have some coffee or dont take her as a morning class. she gives study guides for tests. the fitness activities were interesting. i would reccommend this class.

Terribly boring, not because of the material covered, but the teaching style.  Iam interested in Health and Nutrition..Mrs. Rose is a nice person but kind of makes you want to fall asleep. I dont reccommend her..but that's my opinion ;) Ohh and A LOT of busy work, pretty much for nothing...like we dont have other classes..

This was not a professor I would have taken had I known how much busy work she would give. Her tests had a lot of obscure information that was not covered in her lectures or on the study guides. I usually make all A's, but I struggled to make a B with her. She read from powerpoints the entire time. Activities were fun, but that was about it.
This was a great class with Professor Rose.  She is easy to talk to and gives study guides for tests.

Nice, but too quiet. Low talker, seems like a sweet lady, but she pretends not to hear you. Tests are hard information not on the study guides or in book. I took the friday 3 hour, got out early every time, bring something else to do, notes are online. Good luck!
Tests were hard b/c she does not even teach! shes a very nice teacher and class was fun.

She is very disorganized and is unclear in what she expects in assignments... until the day it's due, then she knows exactly what she wants. Ignore the study guides, they don't help. Just read the chapters and you'll do fine. Slept in class because she'd talk forever on nothing. Her notes are online, though they help little.

this class sucked she's not a good teacher.  she just goes through the powerpoints. half the time you get the feeling that she's seeing the info for the first time. she's got a very boring voice which puts you to sleep. i never paid attention in the class.  i just watched movies on my laptop and got a B. tests are a little hard.  what a joke...

This class was awful!  She isn't clear on assignments at all and she is very unorganized!!  Attendance counts, but lectures are boring and not very helpful.  All the notes are posted on Web CT/Vista anyway.  Study the entire chapter and you'll do fine on tests.

this class was a joke I never went. Lectures are all posted on powerpoints on WebCt, and thats all you have to study for tests. Study guides are also posted on webct. In class activity Labs were annoying but dont count for much. Alot of random assignments that take about one minutes. Her lectures are BORING bring a game or something. Pretty easy.
test are way to hard for an hps class but, u can still make up ur grade by doing good on your projects and labs. Alot of busy work for an hps class. not an easy A

Very easy... assigments are a joke. You can BS all of it. Take her.... I promise you will make an A. She is very helpful. Tests are kind of hard and she sometimes is unclear on what she wants on tests.
You will learn a lot! Tests are hard and you need to study and attend lectures.

She is well informed and lectures each week on the chapters. Her tests are hard and require lots of memorization and calculations. Essays are included each exam. She doesn't give clarity on what will be on the tests. Lots of projects and labs to do.
She is clueless and so are her students...AHHH!!! I felt like we had 298,423 pointless projects due, but she is really nice and obviously spends time preparing for notes.
VERY UNCLEAR... Doesn't really seem to want to clarify herself either. Tests are pretty difficult
Avoid this lady if possible. She is nice but not clear on anything. The syllabus was no help and you will NEVER know when you have a test or when one of her million stupid projects are due.
Does a lot of exercise labs, a lot of notes, and a few projects.  Tests are hard but she is a really sweet and good instructor!  She'll help you in any way she can
Great person and a good teacher. You must be willing to change your eating and exercise habits. Her tests are pretty difficult. All in all a good instructor.
